es.upm.dit.dscc.DHT

Interface DHTUserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DHTHashMap, DHTJGroups, DHTManager

    public interface DHTUserInterface
    Author:
    aalonso This interface describes the API for accessing to the DHT

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsKey(java.lang.String key)
      Checks whether the provided key is in the DHT
      java.lang.Integer get(java.lang.String key)
      Return the value associated to the provided key
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keySet()
      Returns a Set view of the keys contained in this DHT.
      java.lang.Integer put(DHT_Map map)
      Adds a map in the DHT
      java.lang.Integer putMsg(DHT_Map map)
      Adds a map in the DHT It is used when the operation is remote
      java.lang.Integer remove(java.lang.String key)
      Remove the value associated to the provided key
      java.lang.Integer removeMsg(java.lang.String key)
      Remove the value associated to the provided key.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> values()
      Returns a List of the values contained in this DHT.
